spacie_description: A plataform that connects companies with influencers for promotional campaigns. The system integrates with Google, Instagram, and TikTok using the OAuth2 protocol, allowing users to utilize their information from these platforms on Spacie.
cs_analytics_description: This is a website that offers comprehensive statistics, sourced from HLTV, along with personalized analysis by administrators for CS:GO players, teams, and championships. The user can dive deeper into the world of Counter-Strike: Global Offensive with huge data-driven insights.
cs_analytics_alt: CS Analytics Image - CS:GO statistics platform
expert_stats_description: A platform dedicated to providing comprehensive statistics on virtual football, featuring four leagues. It offers extensive odds, recent match data, and detailed statistics for upcoming matches, delivering a thorough insight into the world of virtual football.
expert_stats_alt: Expert Stats Image - Virtual football statistics platform
chirp_description: This is a unique Twitter made by my own, where the user can only use emojis. It served as an excellent project to enhance my knowledge and practice various technologies and design patterns.
name_min_length_error: The name must have at least 3 characters
name_max_length_error: The name must have at most 50 characters
message_min_length_error: The message must have at least 5 characters
message_max_length_error: The message must have at most 500 characters
